name: Animal Boxing
synopsis: Animal Boxing is one of the first games to require inverting the Nintendo DSi system to play. Use the stylus for motion-based controls. Throw jabs, hooks and uppercuts with simple stylus movements. Take On All Challengers: Step into the ring against 50 wild fighters with different fighting styles. Go toe-to-toe against Lee the cat, Sauda the rhino, Fore the bull, and many more! Create A Fighter: Build your own male or female character, then step into the ring in eight unique environments. Customize your gloves, clothing, hairstyle, and more! Battle a Friend: Face off against another player with DS Wireless Play.
